title: If Women Rose Rooted: A Journey to Authenticity and Belonging
description: "I love this book. Truly, it's mind-blowing in the most profound and exhilarating sense." â€”Manda Scott, author of Boudica and Into the FireThis is the second edition of a uniquely empowering, international word-of-mouth bestseller about wild landscapes, female mythology, and the challenges facing modern women. It is a book for any woman who has ever lost her way and who sees a wasteland at the heart of modern existence and longs to live a more authentic, rooted life once again.Sharon Blackie is a writer, storyteller, and psychologist who lives in the hills of Donegal, Ireland.
author: Sharon Blackie
